snippet: Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer questions from readers.
abstract: Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer questions from readers.
lead_paragraph: Are the Texans underrated? Where will Andrew Luck land? How many more coaches will lose their jobs before the draft? Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer questions from readers. Use the comment field below for your questions. Answers will appear Friday on The Fifth Down.

headline.main: Have N.F.L. Questions? Judy Battista Has Answers
